title: Hopeful Dreams/The First Polar Winds Blow in Bed
body:
Last night I dreamt 



I dug up all my potatoes



And there were quite a few



Beneath the leaves which began to die



In late August when the temperature nosedives, here



Now I am awake in bed



Drinking beer from last night



Away for the weekend 



And although tempted



I am not going home to do



Any digging



In fact, I hear the longer you leave 



Them in the ground



The longer they last



In the winter



And when you really think about it who



Isnâ€™t planning



Their escape 



Of their first late



February February



February February



February February



February blues
